pages.text: There are four seasons in the year; Spring, Summer, Autumn and Winter.  Each season is split into early, middle, and late, and each of these last 8 in-game days and nights. As the seasons change so too do the daily maximum and minimum temperatures.

While your biome might be livable in a particular season, think about what it might be like at the height of summer or the depths of winter. Perhaps those migrating animals were onto something after all?
